profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: As a well-organized, creative, and responsible professional, I consistently ensure that my actions are guided by a strong sense of integrity and a commitment to fostering positive relationships. My approachability and friendly demeanor facilitate effective collaboration and communication with colleagues, clients, and stakeholders. I am currently seeking a new challenge that allows me to translate the theoretical knowledge I acquired during my academic journey into practical, real-world applications. My goal is to leverage my skills and expertise to contribute meaningfully to an organization, driving both personal growth and the achievement of organizational objectives.

education.title: Education
education.description1: 2020: Bachelor of Urban and Regional Planning (BURB)
education.description2: 2021: Bachelor of Urban and Regional Planning Honours
education.description3: 2024: Masters of Sustainable Urban Planning and Development
